1.content:
You wake up feeling strange. You can't quite put your finger on what's wrong. Your body just feels wrong.

As you examine your surroundings you think about the last thing your remember.

Your 8 year-old sister, Sarah had some new toy. It was a silver ball. You were watching TV in the living room when she came in to show it to you.

You grabbed it, planning to throw it down the hallway so she'd have to chase it leave you alone.

Then there was a flash of light and.... and then you woke up.

You are laying on the floor of the living room but something is wrong. You, or your body at least, is sitting on the couch. It seems as disoriented as you do.

"What happened?" You ask in a much higher. You recognise it a moment later as your sister's voice.

"It worked!" Your body replies with your voice but somehow without you.

"Sarah?" You ask, again with Sarah's voice.

"Not any more." Your answers. "You're Sarah. I'm Kevin."

You look down at yourself. It does look like your sister's body. You're even wearing the yellow dress she had on.

She's swapped bodies with you somehow. It must have been the ball.

11.content:
You look around the room. You were both holding the ball when you fainted. It must be nearby.

You spot it on the floor. Luckily it's closer to you, well the you in Sarah's body, than it is to the Sarah in your body and she doesn't seem to have spotted it yet.

You lunge for the ball and grab it.

"Give that." Sarah (or Kevin you guess for now) demands.

"Come and take it." You hold out the ball in your hand, assuming that if you both touch it at the same time you'll swap back.

He reaches for the ball but realising what will happen, withdraws before touching it.

You give chase. Your skirt flies up behind you. Fortunately no one is behind you because they would have been given a clear view of your panties.

Kevin runs toward your (his) room. You almost catch him but, still a little uncoordinated in the unfamiliar body, you trip over your own feet.

The ball rolls from your hand as you hit the ground.

Kevin grabs the ball and takes it to his room, shutting the door behind him.

You felt infuriated that she's treating you like a kid. You never felt so insignificant in life before that someone called you cute & little. It's awful enough that parents constantly advices you to do so and so, but now it's worse that someone your own age becomes older than you & starts talking as if you're a mischievous kid. You couldn't stand this anymore. You have dignity. You have pride. You have your own identity. You shouldn't let an 8-year-old ruin it all.

You realize the trouble you are now! She lays you face down on your legs, rests a hand on your back, all you can see is your own feet on the other side.

Of course, this is not the first time you are in this position ... Not that it was a daily occurrence, when you were a child, maybe twice a year, but every time you passed, it was a horrible experience, For Sarah, It was a habit, your mother hits her, almost every day, for being a liar and troublemaker, and now, you are in this situation, and you are afraid that it will become a habit for you as well. You're scared, you know it's going to hurt.

In the next moment, the mother's hand reaches its unprotected bottom. You feel the burning sensation at the same moment, it makes you choke and close your eyes. Yes, it hurts as much as you remember it. You may be 15, but you live in the body of an 8-year-old girl who is not as hardened as yours. A new slap comes, and this time your sigh is much more audible.

And another slap.

And another.

And another.

"Aw .... ow!" You hear yourself say.

More tapas, now you're screaming openly. But your mother does not care, you know very well. She continues the spanking, you feel tears in your eyes. You try not to cry.

A few more blows later, you're crying. Saying you're sorry. That you will not lie again.

You do not know how much time has passed, how many slaps you've won. One hour? Or just a minute? You are a river of tears, a stinging sensation on a warm red background.

You obey ... you go straight to Sarah's bedroom without complaining that it's not your room. Its bottom is on fire, and every heartbeat only throws waves of pungent pain. You shake and cry.

You realize that trying to dwell on the history of the body change was a mistake, a big mistake.

12311.content:
You decide you can convince your mother about the swap. You greet your mother first and tell her there is something you want to talk about.

"Yes, princess?" Her use Sarah's pet name again is uncomfortable but you push on.

You start stammering it out. Once you get going you sort of just start blurting out the details, trying to explain about the mechanics of what happened. You talk about the orb and that you were minding your own business and somehow Sarah just came up to you and swapped your bodies. Your mother understandably is looking at you with bewilderment.. looking honestly a bit distraught.

Her lack of response bothers you and you quickly try to come up with proof.. but upon needing some you start to realize there actually isn't that much about you that your sister wouldn't know. The only thing you can think of is.. well.. the birds and the bees. But by the time you even say the word you've lost control of the conversation.

Your mother finally changes her expression, but it's that of anger. "KEVIN!" she screams, and after a moment you hear your sister leave your room. She stands out looking a bit confused, glancing between you two.. obviously trying to figure out what you had been talking about.

"I don't know what kind of stupid game you've put your sister up to, but discussing inappropriate things with her is out of line. You better not have actually discussed.." she paused for a moment and glanced at you, covering her mouth and mouthing something so you can't see it. ".. THAT.. with her, or you'll be grounded for a year. I'm not joking, young man."

"I didn't mom!" Sarah stammers.. and for a moment you consider getting her in trouble. However, you quickly remember that if you get your body grounded for a year.. once you get it back you'll be the one facing that punishment. Summer was right around the corner and you didn't want to spend it cooped up inside, without any friends!

"Good.. I don't know what you were thinking, Kevin. I know your a prankster but.. leave your sister out of it." Mother sighed. You became very aware how much they were having this discussion as if you weren't even there, which frustrated you. It's not like you were some kind of baby, Sarah was 8.. it might have been practically a baby but it wasn't actually one.

She motioned with her hand. "I got pizza." She grumbled, acting as if she regretted getting it now. "Wash up and eat." She moves away, grumbling something about working all day and coming home to this.

Telling mother apparently wasn't going to work. Sarah smirks at you, feeling pleased with herself.

"Mommy's not going to believe you, Sarah." she teased, once they were out of earshot. She smiled and walked away, looking excited. "Now I get the extra pieces and you only get one! I'm a growing teenage boy!" Seeming still very charmed and excited to now be the older sibling.

With dinner ahead, you weigh your options again. On one hand this was the perfect opportunity to go looking for the orb.. on the other there was a long night ahead of you. You could easily get it later.. and the look in her eye made you think Sarah planned on eating as much pizza as her now bigger stomach could fill. Which, from your experience, was quite a lot.

1522311211.content:
"So about my bed wetting?" Kevin asks the doctor. "Well what do you think?" The doctor replies. "I think I'm a big girl now. I can use the big potty and I really haven't woke up wet in..." To seem more older Kevin holds up 7 of his fingers "Seven! Days." The doctor congratulates your mental sharpness and writes a note to your mother who is surprised. (It's working!!!) You think, excitedly. "Well here's a coupon on girls panties" the doctor says goodbye to you as Kevin comes in. After his turn you all head home. Once in Kevin's room he congratulates you and gets the ball
"A promise is a promise" he says
In that moment everything changed.
No more would Kevin bully Sarah.
All was to be normal.
1522311211.title: FINISH THIS!

15223112111.content:
You both touch the ball as the world swirls with white. You re-awaken to see your arms. You see your legs and best of all. You see Sarah.
You take a hammer and Sarah nods. The ball was instantly destroyed beyond repair by human kind. You hug your sister.
"A promise is a promise"
No more did he tease her. They still argued petty matters but always resolved them.
Never again did Sarah try anything like that again.
All was good in the world.
People would say happily ever after. But that's never true. I'd like to think of it as they lived the best they could.

END
15223112111.title: It's over. Good ending.

153.title: Try to get Sarah (now Kevin) in trouble.

1531.content:
You try to come out fast with a lie about Kevin, a lie convincing enough to have him at least grounded for a week. You find a lot of suitable plots...

"Mom, uh, Kevin, uh" (is smoking... no, skipped school yesterday..., no, have been bullying a kid)... "he has been smok...drink" you babble more time than your mom intends to wait.

Mom frowns, looking down at you... She seems a giant, while in your old body you were taller than her.

"Sarah... are you trying to get your brother in trouble again?" she says in a cold tone

Gosh! You forgot Sarah has tried to do it a few times before... and mom is an expert when it comes to tell you two lying. You get frozen, blushing, feeling that look from mom she hadn't given you since a long time ago... since you were the age you are now... again

"I told you I didn't want it to happen again. If he bullies you, tell me. But do not made up lies!" You just nod in answer.

She takes a chair, places it in the middle of the room, and sits down. "Come here!" she orders you in a tone you hadn't heard from her in years.
1531.title: About a lie you made up that kevin did

choices: You turn to see who is behind you
15311.content:
"I am 15... I can handle this" you say to yourself, trying to gain some courage. But you are scared to the bone... you know what is going to happen.

You stop in front of mom, whose face shows how much angry she is. "Now, little lady, I have warned you several times before. You knew what was in store for you if you lied again!"

You feel your heart racing fast... Like in an out of the body experience, you feel your mom pulling down your underwear and, grabbing your waist, taking you over her lap. You realize, how little you are now!. You lay face down over her legs, she rest a hand on your back, all you can see is the chair's legs and your own feet at the other side.

Of course, it is not the first time you find yourself in this position... Not that it was an everyday occurance, maybe twice a year, but each time it frightened you. And now here you are again. And totally deserved! You realized, you haven't say a word, can't do it either. You are scared, you know it is going to hurt.

"This hurts me more than you, Sarah. But I have to do it, if it is the only way you learn to behave and not tell tales".

The very next moment, mom's hand hits your unprotected bottom. You feel the stinging sensation at the moment, makes you gasp and close your eyes. Yes, it hurts as much as you remembered it. You might be 15, but you live in a 8 years old girl's body, which is not as much hardened as yours. A new swat arrives, and this time your gasp is much more audible.

Another one.

Another one.

And another.

"Aw.... ow!" you hear yourself say.

More swats, you are now openly groaning. But mom doesn't care, you know it very well. She keeps with the spanking, you feel tears in your eyes. You try to keep them back, you try not to cry.

A few more swats after, you are crying. Saying you are sorry. That you won't lie again.

You don't know how much time has passed, how many spankings you got. An hour? A thousand? Or just a minute and merley twenty smaks? Your present is made of tears, a stinging sensation on a warm red bottom, an embarrasment.

"Go to the corner until I call you back and think of what has happened right now", says your mom after putting you back on your feet.

You obey... you go straight to the corner in the living room, and face the wall. Your bottom is on fire, and each heartbeat just throws waves of stinging pain from it. You shake and cry.

You realize that trying to made up a lie was a mistake. A big mistake. You need to get back to your body.

After some time, which seems to be an hour but could have been, lets say a couple of minutes, you hear some noise from footsteps behind you.
15311.title: You obey

153111.title: You turn to see who is behind you

15312.content:
You can't move. You know you have to obey, you have to go to your mom, you have to take what you know is going to happen to you. It isn't all that bad, you say to yourself, I am 15, I play football, I'm not a little girl... Am I not? I'm in her body, I'm a little girl. And I'm frightened of being punished by mom, as little Sarah should be. A spanking from mom is the worst thing imaginable in your little sister's mind, and now you are feeling her fears.

You start to realize, you are becoming Sarah. Not only you are trapped in her body, you feel the bars closing around your mind.

"Come here!" says your mom again. She looks angry. You feel a tear running down your face, but start walking towards her, sitting on the chair and pointing her lap.

You feel your strengh reducind faster and faster. You feel you are losing the fight, you are becoming an 8 years old girl, not only in her body but in her mind.

While your mom is pulling down your underwear, you start to understand your mistake. You decided to be Sarah. You didn't actually fight. You lose in the first round.

As mom places you over her lap, you start to forget that there was ever a magic ball.

When the first swat lands on your bottom, you have already forgotten you once were a teenage boy.

When mom has finished, you, crying, feeling the sting from your warm bottom, just want to be forgiven and let play with your dolls.

Mom kisses you, asks you to behave. You nod, you say sorry, why would you disobey? You just want your mom to love you, and she does even if she has to punish you. You understand it, it makes you happy.

You are 8. You are a little girl. It won't change by means of magic, will it?
15312.title: You stay still, frightened

info.brief_description: Your little sister finds a way to swap bodies with you.
info.description:
If you like reading or writing interactive stories with AB/DL themes please join our Google Group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/thicklypadded

You were a 15 year-old boy named Kevin but your 8 year-old sister, Sarah, has found a way to swap bodies with you and she doesn't plan to swap back.

If you are adding to this story please keep it in the style of a "choose your own adventure" type book. That is keep the point of view 2nd person (The main character of the story is refered to as "You" - the reader) and limit options to choices that character can make, not events outside their control. Eg "Which door will you open? 1) The red door 2) The green door" is good but "What do you find behind the red door? 1) An over-sized nursery 2) The girls' locker room." is not.
